elements.label: Complete your profile to activate COVID-19 protection Rp 1 mio/day (max of Rp 30 mio) by registering to Personal Accident protection for free. Start your free health assessment today!
Please start by entering your mobile phone number
We need your birthday to see if you qualify for this free Personal Accident Protection
We need your birth place to see if you qualify for this free Personal Accident Protection
We need to know the name of the Beneficiary who will receive the Benefit of this protection. You can fill in the name of one of your family members
We need your address to see if you qualify for this free Personal Accident Protection
Activate free Personal Accident protection and COVID-19 benefit, by providing your KTP number below
Cash benefit of Rp 10.000.000 in case of accident
Additional cash benefit of Rp 1.000.000/day in case of hospitalization by COVID-19 infection (maximum of Rp 30.000.000)
Cash benefit of Rp 10.000.000 in case of accident
Additional cash benefit of Rp 1.000.000/day in case of hospitalization by COVID-19 infection (maximum of Rp 30.000.000)

You are entitled to free Personal Accident protection of IDR 10 mio for 6 months, and additional benefit of free COVID-19 protection of IDR 1 mio/day (maximum of IDR 30 mio) until 30 June 2020.
Electronic certificate for the free Personal Accident protection will be sent to your email address.
